name: GreekFacts
0:
”Alexa, start greek fact”
”Alexa, load greek fact”
”Alexa, open greek fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: greek fact
des:
This skill features the most interesting facts related to the Greek mythology and how it has influenced languages far and wide. Most of our phrases and literature is inspired from the Greek mythology.

You can invoke this skill by saying 
"Alexa, load greek fact",
"Alexa, open greek fact", 
"Alexa, start greek fact".
